content: made by marcie original design summer halter crop top ***this is a downloadable digital pdf file not a finished item*** all my patterns are made for beginners/intermediate crocheters i include step by step instructions with many photos i have a video tutorial on ig - https //www instagram com/tv/b-7wzgnhrbz/ igsh=cndsathwzhb2ejn2 the pattern is written in english and uses standard us terminology it includes instructions for sizes small medium & large **sizes ** small under bust 25 each cup width 7 approx medium under bust 27 each cup width 8 5 approx large under bust 28 each cup width 9 5 approx **note 1 ** the under bust band will stretch so please allow for this stretch i suggest measuring out the under bust band as you work on it and adjusting accordingly to your measurements **note 2 ** if you choose to create a lace up back you will need to create at least 1 less repeat you can choose this accordingly as you make it **hook ** 4mm **gauge ** 10cm = 19sts x 22rows working in single_crochet **i would strongly recommend checking the gauge before starting i tend to work tightly so please check gauge to avoid having to start again** **yarn ** heavy dk weight yarn **yarn i used ** cotton blend knitcraft cotton blend plain dk yarn **yarn amount ** size small x3 100g ball approx size med x3/4 100g ball approx size large x4/5 100g ball approx if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact me *** i am unable to accept returns or give refunds on patterns*** you may sell finished products you make with this pattern however please credit me as the designer reference my shop homemadebymarcie and the pattern you have used do not alter share or sell this pattern it is for your personal use only ©marciemakes instagram page https //www instagram com/marciemakess/
